Print settings

We’ve designed our parts to work with the settings displayed below. Make sure to respect these settings, otherwhise parts might turn out weak or look weird. If you’re not happy with the print quality, join our Discord and ask for some help.

Recommended print settings

  • First layer height 0.24mm
  • Layer height: 0.2mm
  • Extrusion width: 0.4mm, forced
  • Infill pecentage: 40%
  • Infill type: Adaptive Cubic, grid, gyroid, honeycomb, triangle, or cubic
  • Wall count: 4
  • Solid top/bottom layers: 5
  • Supports: NONE

Credits for most of the recommended print settings Voron
